questions.text:
Option 1: Imagine you are a nurse. Introduce yourself to your partner.

Describe to your partner how you took care of a patient who was in an accident.
prompts: Where do you work? What do you do each day in your workplace? What did you do for the patient?

questions.text: Option 2: Imagine you are an actor. Introduce yourself to your partner. Talk to your partner about a film you acted in recently.
prompts:
What is the name of the film?
What was your role in the film?
Where was the film shot? How did your fans react to the film?

questions.text: Option 3: Imagine you are a sportsman or sportswoman.Introduce yourself to your partner.Talk about an exciting match that you played recently.
prompts:
Which sport do you practise?
Where do you practise every day?
Which match did you play in? How did you perform in that match?
